FuncDef:
The te-class-mapping command creates TE-class mapping table or displays the TE-class mapping view.
The undo te-class-mapping command deletes TE-class mapping table.
By default, no TE-class mapping table is configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The TE-class mapping table takes effect only in IETF mode. The TE-class mapping table can be configured but cannot take effect in non-IETF mode.
A TE-class mapping table must be configured using the te-class-mapping command before configuring this table.
All configured TE-classes are deleted after the undo mpls command is run in the system view or the undo mpls te command is run in the MPLS view.
A TE-class mapping table exists by default in IETF mode.
